introData: I am Madurai based Linux System enthusiast, a web developer, quick learner of new technologies and a dedicated scripter and programmer. A fresher with hands-on on various programming languages and concepts.
I am currently working as Frontend Developer at NFN Labs, Chennai on ReactJS, Javascript and cross platform app development using Facebook's React Native.

experience.description: I am currently working here as cross platform app developer using Facebook's React Native. Have learned a lot including Javascript, React and much more. The work culture here is awesome and it will always be my favourite place.

education.college: PSNA College of Engg. and Tech.
education.description: I completed my under-graduate degree in Bachelor of Technology in the branch Information Technology in PSNA College of Engineering and Technology on 2018. I took this course based on my interest towards the emerging IT sector during this period and I dedicated myself for learning new technologies.

education.college: Mahatma Montessori Matric. Hr. Sec. School
education.description: I did my higher secondary education and secondary schooling here. That was one of the good days in my life where we have learnt many things including Paper Presentation, Seminars, Spot pitching and so on. Here we used to learn things in a more practical manner rather than theoretically.
